meanings.definition: The excessive or unnecessary use of something.
meanings.sent1: Her overutilizations of the office printer led to high printing costs.
meanings.sent2: The overutilizations of water during the drought caused a shortage in the reservoir.
meanings.sent3: His overutilizations of the snack machine were legendary in the office.
meanings.sent4: The overutilizations of her phone battery drained it within hours.
meanings.sent5: The overutilizations of the limited resources left nothing for others to use.

meanings.definition: The act of utilizing something too much.
meanings.sent1: The overutilizations of the gym equipment caused it to break down frequently.
meanings.sent2: Overutilizations of the car engine led to its early wear and tear.
meanings.sent3: His overutilizations of the elevator buttons amused his colleagues.
meanings.sent4: The overutilizations of the old bridge weakened its structure over time.
meanings.sent5: The overutilizations of the playground equipment made it unsafe for children.
